name: AttraPulsion
description:
Welcome to Attrapulsion

A game about a fearless young genius called Emile who built himself some fancy gauntlets able to push and pull objects and is now trying them out on the mind-controlled people and robots roaming the streets of his city on his way to duke it out with the big robot controlling them.

Emile’s Gauntlets can attract random bits of scrap to throw at his enemies, grab and throw metal enemies around as well as steal weapons from his foes while blocking their bullets with a handy shield.

Can you utilize all of their abilities to their full potential and beat the boss while the streets are flooded by roaming evildoers?
